name: Contextificator
tagline: A js client side bookmarklet that adds context to the web pages you're reading
body:
### Welcome to the Contextificator

Find yourself reading something, wanting to find out more, opening up new tabs, searching, reading, flicking backwards and forwards?  The Contextificator does all that in the page you're on, with a click of a button.

Want it?  Just drag this [Contextify](javascript:(function (win,doc) { var C = "CONTEXTIFICATOR"; win[C] = win[C] || (win[C]={}); win[C].Bookmarklet || (win[C].Bookmarklet = { URL:'https://rawgithub.com/mattparker/contextificator/master/bookmarklet.js', URL_SECURE:'https://rawgithub.com/mattparker/contextificator/master/yh2013/bookmarklet.js',loaded: false, iframeId: null}); if (!win[C].Bookmarklet.loaded) { var B=win[C].Bookmarklet, d=doc, h=d.head||d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||d.documentElement, s=d.createElement('script'); s.setAttribute('src',win.location.protocol==='https:'?B.URL_SECURE:B.URL); h.appendChild(s); } else { var iframe = document.getElementById(win[C].Bookmarklet.iframeId); iframe.contentWindow.CONTEXTIFICATOR.run();}}(this,this.document));) button to your favourites bar and use it where-ever you're reading.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
